dating.remarks: [Museo Nacional de San Carlos/Insituto Nacional de Bellas Artes, San Carlos, revised 2014]

pageContext.description:
The panel shows Adam and Eve in Paradise, at the moment when Eve is showing the forbidden fruit to him. The tree trunk acts as a symmetrical axis for the composition. The background shows an open space with great foliage, giving evidence of Cranach's skills. In Eve we can observe the characteristic type of female nude present in Cranach's work.
[Museo Nacional de San Carlos/Insituto Nacional de Bellas Artes, San Carlos, revised 2014]
